page.title: 01Bethlehem Area
page.content: The area comprises of two river valleys, the{Afon Towy}flowing south west and its tributory the{Afon Sawdde flowing North West.Within the area is the northen section of the{Brecon {Beacon National Park.}Two villages lie within the area,{Bethlehem}and another {Felindre}which is part of Llangadog. The area as a whole is rural with small hamlets and villages with{dairy {farming}prominent on the valley flours and{beef}and{sheep}on the valley slopes and higher ground.Alongside the {Afon Towy}is the main Shrewsbury to Swansea railway line and the{A40}trunk road.Language used is predominately {Welsh,}with it as the main medium for education.The flavour of the area can be shown by its one small{Post Office and one{small school}with{24 pupils.
